comments.content: From the very first game we played, Spiders have been our enemy, dogging our steps as we go. In this quest we take the fight to them as we descend into their Burrow. But will you survive the descent? https://visionofthepalantir.com/2020/07/28/beneath-the-sands/ [https://visionofthepalantir.com/2020/07/28/beneath-the-sands/]
